name: I Have No Mouth and I Must Freeman
name_original: I Have No Mouth and I Must Freeman
description:
Finally, after a decade of waiting, Half Life 3: I Have No Mouth and I Must Freeman has been released.

Experience the epic conclusion by climbing aboard the mysterious ship, Borealis, to uncover something that will change the universe of Half-Life forever.

Move with WASD, left and right click to interact. Controllers are supported (except in the menus for now).

Everything by me: Nick Kornek
